text: Nolavia is a monotypic genus of Brazilian huntsman spiders containing the single species, Nolavia rubriventris. It was first described by C. F. Kammerer in 2006, and is found in Brazil. ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of Brazil
title: Nolavia
